title: EnO inda nishi vELai tanilum
sahitya:
EnO inda nishi vELai tanilum gAnam isaikka vENum 
irundisaikkavum pozhudO illai EnaDi tollai bhAramAghudu


anupallavi

  vAnOr mayanga vandaNaittum brndA nandA nandavanamengilum 
edirolikkiradE kaNNaip-parikkum vaNNamirukkum eNNamirukkum


caraNam    nAradar vandAr viNNappam tAnonru tandAr nennEl enniDam un piLLai 
dAmOdaranai nAnirundu pATham kETka sangIta shikSai enakku jnAnam
pera nI udava vENumenrAr adarkku nAnenna sholvEnaDi uDan naghaittEnaDi
sAmagAna ni dha ni pa dhA ni sA ma ga ri sa ni dha ma* ga* ri* sa* ni dha (pA dha ni sA* sA* ri)
tAkru tOmta kuttaNa tajham taNam kiTata jhaNuta taka tadingiNatOm (Dingu taNamtari)
sIraDi daNDai olikka kALiyan mEl tigazha nigazhndadaDi OrATTam adai
sEvittup-pugazhndu narttanam enru vaghuttu sheyyudaDi oru perum kUTTam
pAraDi shollap-pOnAl enakkut-tAnaDi varum paghaTTukkAri enra paTTam mArATTam
bhairavikkum tODikkum pArATTU ennaDi adil pancamattai mAttiviTTup-pADinavan ATTam
